questions.question: What is the formula weight of ZJU-32?
What is the BET surface area of ZJU-32a obtained from N2 adsorption isotherm at 77 K?
What is the crystal system and space group of ZJU-32?
What are the dimensions of the large and small cages in ZJU-32?
questions.answer: The large cage is approximately 18.8 Å and the small one is approximately 17.0 Å.

questions.question: What is the heating rate used in Thermogravimetric analyses (TGA) for ZJU-32?
What is the yield percentage for the synthesis of Dimethyl 5'-((3,5-bis(methoxycarbonyl)phenyl)ethynyl)-[1,1':3',1''-terphenyl]-4,4''-dicarboxylate (3)?
How does the BET surface area of ZJU-32a compare to ZJU-5?
questions.answer: ZJU-32a has a larger BET surface area than ZJU-5.

questions.question: What method was used for the crystallographic measurements of ZJU-32?
questions.answer: Oxford Xcalibur Gemini Ultra diffractometer with an Atlas detector using graphite-monochromatic Mo Kα radiation.

questions.question: What is the role of CuCl2•2H2O in the synthesis of ZJU-32?
questions.answer: CuCl2•2H2O acts as a source of copper for the formation of the Cu-paddle wheels in the framework of ZJU-32.

questions.question: What is the significance of the virial equation in the analysis of isotherm data for ZJU-32?
questions.answer: The virial equation is used to analyze the isotherm data to understand the adsorption characteristics of ZJU-32.

questions.question: How does the pore volume of ZJU-32a compare to NOTT-102?
questions.answer: ZJU-32a has a larger pore volume than NOTT-102.

questions.question: What is the purpose of activating ZJU-32 at 373 K under high vacuum before gas sorption studies?
questions.answer: The purpose is to remove guest solvent molecules from the framework to prepare the activated form of ZJU-32 for accurate gas sorption measurements.

questions.question: Is the BET surface area of ZJU-32a higher than 3000 m2/g?
Does ZJU-32 have a BET surface area larger than all NbO or PtS-type MOFs mentioned in the text?
Is the crystal system of ZJU-32 cubic?
Was dimethyl 5-ethynylisophthalate (2) synthesized according to Ref. [1]?
Is the gas sorption measurement for ZJU-32 performed at temperatures below 0°C?
Does the synthesis of ZJU-32 involve a heating step at 70°C for 15 days?
Is the crystallographic data for ZJU-32 collected using Cu Kα radiation?
Is the yield for the synthesis of H4L over 95%?
